website_summaries.verdict: Made to take on the go, the Move has an impressive battery life and a durable build.
pros: With a 10-hour battery and an IP56 rating, this powerful speaker can handle a bit of dust and water while on the go
Multiple streaming options and Trueplay audio tuning
A high-quality speaker ready to play music anywhere
cons: Challenging setup and some connectivity issues
The battery loses charge even when the speaker is turned off

website_summaries.verdict: It’s hard to beat the premium audio quality and versatility of the Sonos Move, but its high price tag holds it back.
cons: This little speaker is an expensive option

website_summaries.verdict: If you can live with its price and size, the Sonos Move is an excellent portable wireless speaker that expands the play area of your Sonos system.
pros: A solid portable speaker for an existing Sonos system
Sturdy, water-resistant, dustproof and voice-enabled (on a Wi-Fi network) with Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa
Autotuning system calibrates to any environment
cons: Somewhat expensive, the Move is big and hefty for a portable speaker
Battery life can be adversely impacted by how you use it

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Sonos delivers a wireless speaker!! Best of all It checks all the boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Portable (Check), pairable (check), weather resistant (check), Trueplay (check), voice control (check), bluetooth (check), Sonos sound and of course WiFi capability, (Check and Mate). This really is an amazing speaker. If you own a Sonos system it's a great adjunct. I now have 19 Zones with my new "Move" speakers including three Zones in my yard. The "Move" is the speaker I've been hoping that Sonos would make. Every situation is different but I'd highly recommend getting a pair of them. Everything sounds better in stereo. Enjoy and thanks Sonos for making life just a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Lars Swanson

customer_reviews.title: A product at this price point should have top-notch support. Did not receive that from Sonos.
customer_reviews.text: Just sent it back. I have 12 Sonos products at two different residence working fine. With Alexa. This product took two days on the phone with Amazon Alexa service, and Sonos service, to try to get it to communicate with Alexa. In this process, lost connection to my other Sonos speakers in the group. Was finally able to get connection with the help of Alexa support. Sonos support was completely useless. Very surprised at a high-end product with this type of support. Turned out to be a Sonos problem and I was able to get my speakers back. Thanks to Alexa. Support.
customer_reviews.author: robert a cistrelli

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware backward compatibilty NOT possible
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these for Christmas and received an email from Sonos that they would be dicontinuig software updates for my older Sonos products. The only reason I waited to buy Sonos portable speakers was to maintain backward compatibility with my "legacy" products as they now refer to them. The Speakers are very mediocre for the price. It was only worth the premium to me because of backward compatibility which they are now saying is going away. Sonos, I will no longer be recommending your products to anyone as I used to.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Mobile sound to die for
customer_reviews.text: First off, I've only had the speaker for 24 hours, so my experience is limited. I'm currently on vacation with family at a house in Maine and ordered this to have some tunes. I've had several family members already ask about it and shown interest. The sound is fantastic, and battery life seems amazing. My only complaint would be cost, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Setup was a struggle
customer_reviews.text: I struggled getting the bluetooth set up for close to an hour. The app is horrible and I actually got stuck in an infinite loop from the "get updates" screen. I ended up having to reset to factory settings, which worked. The instructions that came with it were awful and I had to do Internet searches to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: NWguy

customer_reviews.title: Genius Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speaker, that can play indoors connecting to your existing Sonos system... you have the option of taking it outdoors as well... it connects via Bluetooth or WiFi... very durable, water resistant... it also works with Alexa or Google assistance. There are Smart Speakers, this is a Genius Speaker... it does it all... and it does it all, Very Well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A DiPenice

customer_reviews.title: good sound, poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery, when not in use, holds a charge for two to three days. This is not a grab-and-go device. Several hours of advance planning are required before use to ensure that the battery has a sufficient charge. The sound quality is good, but not really worth the trouble to use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, awful battery
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, but garbage battery. Full charge doesnt last long, and battery drains when it is off. So unless you have it on the charger all of the time, it's practically useless. Giving it a few more days in modifying my use case, but so far not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound in a Portable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Have an entire house of Sonos speakers and this one hits a sweet spot. No more do I need to schlep a Play 1 outside or wherever. Sound quality is unbelievable just like all Sonos speakers. I think the sound is a little bigger than the Play 1. I also purchased a Bose Portable Home speaker and this blows it away. The Sonos Move also comes with the charging cradle included and its extra with Bose. I haven’t tried Bluetooth mode as I am always typically connected to WiFi. The only negative I can say is the cradle and power cable are connected and the plug is fairly large. It wouldn’t fit through a grommet on a desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jim J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this Sonos Move!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible setup process, and when you think you finally made it, after some time it disconnects and you wont be able to make work again, so you start up again with the setup and nothing! frustrating process, i did firmware update and nothing, my phone, iPad or any other device cant see it, follow the instructions for nothing, it just don't work and when sometimes it does, wont last for long. they just stole my money in plain site! now i have a Sonos Move in my bed night table that doesn't work. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Facuseh

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced junk with unsolvable choppy audio issues
customer_reviews.text: Sonos speakers are garbage. I have 6 and at best 2-3 might work at a time. They put the blame on you router; your Wifi, your whatever.... in short; they cut out all the time. Nothing like choppy audio for months upon months, on top of crap software updates that are buggy and make you reset your whole speaker system, for top top dollar. Save yourself and your money
customer_reviews.author: Melko18

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Sonos Standards
customer_reviews.text: The speaker itself is up to par and what one would expect from Sonos. Good bass and range and quality construction. That said, Sonos has really let us down with the software. The speaker drops in and out of speaker groupings and seems to lag behind the other speakers producing something like an echo. I have 8 Sonos speakers and have owned a dozen. I’ve never encountered these problems before, and Sonos doesn’t seem to have a fix.
customer_reviews.author: N. ENLOW

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased outdoor speakers in the past and have used them for a short time and lost interest. I love my Sonos and use it often. The best part for me is its connectivity to Alexis which allows me to listen to the Amazon music of my choice. I also use it to play my downloaded songs. This is a small thing but it is so easy to carry to my patio because you can grip it from the back. Other devices I have owned were clumsy to move, one being by Bose. Sound is great, easily controlled with my iPhone or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t connect
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Bluetooth speaker, and the first I couldn’t connect. Having to connect via an app vs just Bluetooth is annoying, but when the app couldn’t find the speaker ... I went to the faq, did everything it said, and it still couldn’t find the speaker. I give up and am returning this thing. For this much money, I want sound, not frustration. Sonos has a great rep, but I don’t get it given the set up mess. My iPad is connected to 6 other Bluetooth things, so it’s the speaker, not me.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya

customer_reviews.title: Just Do It!
customer_reviews.text: if you're already a sonos fan, I have little more to say than my title li e. If you haven't made the jump; I ha e little more to say than my title line. It is IP56 rated for dust and water. It, if ally, has bluetooth compatibility . The WiFi range is amazing and the SOUND QUITY IS SPECTACULAR!!! Granted, it carries a hefty price tag. BUT(t) it is the best sound out there. The app is great and sonos is improving with each update and iteration. The only issue is the deep backorder. I purchased in mid June and received it 5 weeks later. Buy now listen, anywhere you want, later.
customer_reviews.author: M-Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this speaker. Blends in perfect with my existing Sonos, or moves around with me. The WiFi range is impressive... Much better than my phone's! If I have one issue, it's that the Sonos has a WiFi connection, but my phone is out of range and switches to mobile network. And when not on WiFi, I can't manage my sonos through the app to skip is change songs. Again , more of a phone issue (samsumg s8+) than Sonos.... Impressed with the range!
customer_reviews.author: RobG

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speakers BUT SONOS integration is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Good speakers if you only buy one, but I made the mistake of buying more than one and then trying to integrate them all together with SiriusXM, Amazon music, Alexa , Audible etc. and I have had nothing but problems. For example, I get it working with all 3 of my Sonos Moves together with SiriusXM over Wifi and it will work one day and the next day it stops working. I get it set up again and it stops working again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Well done again, Sonos!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to pull the trigger on this purchase. After all, we have bluetooth speakers laying around everywhere. But, once I did, I have zero regret. It sounds MUCH better than I expected and the battery life is excellent! One tip... You need to connect to Bluetooth for the first time while it is still connected to WIFI. So, don't take it on a trip until you have paired it once.
customer_reviews.author: Great One

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to projector  :-(
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. I was looking to improve the sound when watching movies outdoors. I use a Nebula Capsule and connect a speaker to it via Bluetooth. After doing some research on best outdoor speakers I bought the Move in white. Turns out the Sonos Move is only designed to play music from your phone, it is not designed to connect to a projector (explained by a very helpful person via their chat service). I would give it 5 stars for the wonderful sound+deep bass and very helpful customer service except that it can’t do the 1 thing I need it to do. Will be returning and continue looking for a new speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Could not connect to wifi so therefore could not use this. Tried for 2 days! Just wanted to plug and go or pair and use bluetooth. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: R Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. Get it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Pros: easy to connect & works great. It also controls all my Alexa enabled smart devices that even my Amazon Alexa device (FireTV Cube) won't control. (That's another story.) Cons: It's a little awkward to carry bc it doesn't have a handle, you carry it from the back. It doesn't come with a carrying case. It just comes in the cloth bag which is basically a dust cloth.
customer_reviews.author: JYF

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the Sonos Move! I have several Sonos speakers in my house but I wanted a portable speaker I could use when I'm working outside and the Move has fit that need perfectly. The speaker connected immediately to my existing Sonos system (S2) and I've used it for a couple of months now without any problems. I particularly like the Move's excellent battery life and light weight, easy to carry design. The fact it connects with both WIFI and Bluetooth means I'm able to take it with me anywhere and use it to play music from my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm in Boston

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Out There
customer_reviews.text: Sonos has created what may be the perfect portable speaker. Set up through the Sonos app (my first Sonos) was effortless. The setup makes you want to buy more Sonos equipment. A bit large and heavy for a perfect portable speaker but the sound is incredible. Auto tunes to its setting in about 30 seconds. Sonos app integrates all the music apps but leaves out Spotify Podcasts; I connect with Apple Airplay 2 for that. Bluetooth connected once and was a cinch. Definitely made for synchronizing with home network. Dont use Alexa much but that was easy to setup. Ask for the weather each morning. I use in my office when not mobile. Bought a case for travel. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN FILE

customer_reviews.title: one of the single best purchases I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: We have about 15 Sonos speakers now. Awesome sound and the Sonos app is great. The “Move” in particular is excellent. My only regret is that I didn’t just buy a couples Moves first and skip all the other sonos speakers we bought previously. We find ourselves carrying the Move around all over the place and not really using all the other Sonos speakers now. We’ll see how long the rechargeable battery holds up. Few months in so far and it’s great, easily lasts multiple hours.
customer_reviews.author: DKL81

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker. It’s quite heavy and a bit bigger than you think (I was expecting it to be about the size of a one). Indoors has fantastic sound but outdoors I found it lacked a bit of oomph. Switching between Bluetooth and Sonos isn’t automatic but I found with Alexa I’m just using that
customer_reviews.author: Martyjimbo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Addition to Sonos Family!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to Sonos line up. Key pointer, to activate Alexa functionality, you need to activate voice ability under settings in the Sonos ap. We have wanted an indoor outdoor sonos speaker for years, and this does not disappoint. Great sound quality and easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Speaker in regards to sound quality and portability, However, in regards to general usage, Alexa functionality and reliability, and value for the price, it’s a pretty large fail. I would highly recommend spending less than $400 on a speaker with this kind of functionality. I believe that its Bose or other counterparts, although not portable, would be a much better value.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase - Awesome Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple Sono Speakers (2 small One’s and one Play 5). Adding it to existing system was easy. Sound quality - move has more Depth then the One’s but little less depth than Play 5. Battery life is good, but it’s new. True answer to battery quality might come down the road. Flexible to move around is awesome and range is good. Bluetooth option is cool, wife took speaker to friends backyard and worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SoCoFish the neighborhood DIY Dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice Speaker but major flaws
customer_reviews.text: Love the speaker but I can't get it play through my TV via WiFi. Works great with bluetooth and it kicks on when I turn on the TV with the push of a button on my TV remote. Wish it would work thru WiFi for added oomph. The set up process is cumbersome but alas I could not get the WiFi to work on it. As such I'm returning it and just buy a standard sound bar hooked with an HDMI cable especially considering the cost of this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: The battery dies after four hours. It is not up to 10 to 12 hours of continuous use as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker for the long life only. My niece has one that's a year or two old and it lasts up to 10 hours for her. My speake dies 4 hours, almost on the dot. I exchanged it for a new one in August and the new one does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Not east to connect without other Sonos gear
customer_reviews.text: In order to connect to PC through WIFI without other Sonos gear i difficult. You have to get software that is 3rd party and its not reliable. I have expensive Marantz Digital Preamp and Sonos will not connect through WFI to it so I must go through the PC. Bluetooth is good with Iphone but I want to liste nfrom my PC which is my main source of music. Sonos gear not good enough quality. Only using these for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8fuldan

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound, fills any room where the speaker is placed.
customer_reviews.text: I'm all about sound and the Sonos Move has great sound. Easy to set up and works off of wifi as well as bluetooth. Well worth the price. Last portable I will buy great product.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Unlucky for me. I got defected one :(. I am going to buy from Sonos website
customer_reviews.text: I have it delivered to me yesterday and I was so excited. After trying to setup which I thought it should be easy as I have 5 Sonos Play One in my home and 20 other in-wall built in speakers from Sonos. It turned out I got defected one. Talked to Sonos technical support and amazon technical support > Sonos technical support. Spent 2 hours on the call and they confirmed it's defected one. I am going to return and buy directly from Sonos website. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James Lam Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Good but, needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of the Move, as for why I ordered one as soon as I could. The speaker sounds great... when I can get it to play. It is constantly getting lost from my system and even when I can locate the lost speaker it can’t play music that can be played anywhere else in the system. Probably not a speaker problem but a Sonos programming problem that is not yet sorted out. I was hoping for a better outcome with the new app. Nope. It’s a shame because we really enjoy the rest of our system and would love for the Move to perform without these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Too many connectivity issues!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great...when you can actually get the speaker to play. Most of the time it shows up as offline or just doesn’t show up at all. I was looking forward to getting the MOVE so I could seamlessly play music between my indoor and outdoor spaces (indoor spaces using two Sonos:1 speakers). This speaker has been nothing but a hassle since I set it up. It will play for awhile and then randomly drop off the network. In order to get it to work again, I have to factory reset it and add it back to the app. Every single time. Not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down #1 King of Portable Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best portable speaker I have ever owned. Considering I am a huge Sonos fan and have all the products this was a perfect fit to my collection. Yes the price tag is high but in my opinion it is worth every penny. The only issue I have had is connecting to Bluetooth on my Mac but with my phone have not had a problem. Sound quality and range is superb!
customer_reviews.author: DHut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality with portability
customer_reviews.text: I have had various Sonos products in my house for a number of years and I’ve always been happy with the sound quality. I’ve seen a couple of mixed reviews on the Sonos move but decided to give it a try because I had the ability to return it if I wasn’t satisfied. I was so satisfied with the sound and quality that I ordered a second one. If you’re looking for a portable speaker that does not sacrifice sound quality for the portability this is the speaker for you. It integrated easily into my Sonos system And I have been using it outside on my deck and patio area.
customer_reviews.author: Falkon S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bluetooth indoor/outdoor speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything Sonos claims. Quality is evidenced actually in packaging, how speaker sets down perfectly into charging base, weight of speaker (strong magnet, good base/throw). Great bluetooth connectivity and has option to turn off microphone integration such that it is just a one-way bluetooth receiver. Did not like having to install an app to get the speaker setup (and then deleted the app) but there is actually a security aspect to this that makes it a good consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Teague

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This thing does pump the noise quite well. I have used it a fair bit in my 1,600 SF shop space and it fills the area just fine. I am not a big fan of the Sonos app, as it is really basic and has had a tendency to get randomly disconnected from the WiFi environment. Even so, reconnecting has been successful.
customer_reviews.author: MotleyMT

customer_reviews.title: Nice versatility but lacking in bass.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker to add to an existing Sonos system. It is nice to be able to take out on the deck. It’s nice to have the flexibility of using WIFI or Bluetooth with a switch on the back of the unit. I understand the limitations of its size but the bass is lacking in my opinion. Not enough to return it, but still disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A M L

customer_reviews.title: Product does not use SonosNet
customer_reviews.text: Overall, another high quality Sonos product; however, I discovered after buying it that it does not use Sonos' proprietary SonosNet to stream music, but instead relies on local wifi when not in Bluetooth mode. For those of us without a robust stable wifi environment, SonosNet is a key differentiator that makes Sonos products better than the rest. I was very disappointed to learn the Move did not take advantage of SonosNet. In order to utilize it, I had to rearrange where my various Sonos products sit so that the Move's primary resting place was in one of the few places in my home where wifi is relatively stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! The sound is amazing for the size. It’s not the booming bass of the large stationary unit but it fills a large room. It’s ideal for the bedroom and living room. We put it in the hallway and it fills both ends of the apartment. We got it for the beach house but may have to get another for there! Getting ready to replace our old surround sound system with the Sonos system. A really great spend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought a second
customer_reviews.text: Love this little speaker. I was fortunate enough to get a great deal on a second speaker and love the way the sound fills a room. If I had a criticism it would be that the Sonos App won't control the speakers when they are on Bluetooth. You must be on WiFi in order for the app to work. Kind of lame really and was frustrating because the app is really good. I wanted to be able to use the app via Bluetooth while away from the house. Fix this little "bug" Sonos and it's a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bosch

customer_reviews.title: A lot of sound for a hefty price
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain about the sound quality of this speaker. We have sonos play 1 speakers in the house and it groups up with them perfectly. It's been splashed with water and even draw on with chalk (thanks to my 4 year old). Cleans easily. Works great with both wifi and bluetooth. My only con, the pricetag. $400 is a lot for a portable speaker, but we still don't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: TheArtisticRat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Sound quality is not as good as the station speakers are. It’s easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Shari G

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 400
customer_reviews.text: Underwhelming sound quality for the price and off the charge don’t count on it playing for more than 4-5 hours. Comes with halo charger but not wall charger. Returning after a week
customer_reviews.author: dwin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - terrible battery life for a portable
customer_reviews.text: As a long term Sonos owner I really wanted and expected that this speaker would perform in the same excellent manner as my other Sonos components (Connect, Beam, Play 1s, One and SL), And though the sound and interface are of expected high quality, the unit is suffering from high battery drain even when turned off. So much so that I can not rely on it to be functional as a portable outdoors speaker - it's main function. Though I would normally wait for a software update to fix this issue, at this price point I would expect that these issues would have been resolved since it's Sept 2019 release date.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great so far.  Set up Alexa too..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Great sound... just wish it could be a little louder to fill the room, but that's my mistake I'm sure. Havent tried outside yet, but bought it for the waterproof/outdoor feature.
customer_reviews.author: spizeii

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: It's a big and heavy speaker. Very well built. Sounds great in any room, but also works as an extra, deeper speaker if you have a Beam or other speakers on your TV- easy to link up with the Sonos app. Great if you want to connect to your laptop via BT and have extra sound for a zoom meeting or something, too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: Connect the same vibe inside & outside
customer_reviews.text: I just connected the Move to our existing Sonos system (we had 4 speakers, this is the 5th). Easy peasy. Sound is amazing. Started charging right away and went from 30% to 60% in like 10 minutes. Hefty & durable speaker and charging base. I can’t wait to take this into our backyard by the pool in the summer. We have the little Bose Revolve for travel (Which also has awesome sound for its little size) so this Sonos Move (for us) is all about adding more sound inside & when outdoors, connecting the same vibes from indoors to outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addict

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PLAIN AND SIMPLE
customer_reviews.text: Sonos move is my first sonos product and it is plain an simple fantastic , it really integrates fantastically,, setup is very , very easy , only but is it could be even easier . I feel try wanted to have a midern feel with setup instruction , but plain more direct button function to a newbe would be simpler and more effective.. that said it is easy to setup and a fantastic product .
customer_reviews.author: Sherwin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Privacy and option - thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it does not have a microphone, thank you for keeping privacy an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to Existing sonos setup
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect speaker if you are already there in the Sonos ecosystem. It's a Sonos one with battery attached to it. Portability is there but is quite heavy to take with you everywhere. I wish it was lighter and that would have made it a perfect speaker but if weight is not an issue, then this sounds incredible.
customer_reviews.author: taran

customer_reviews.title: Home Run!
customer_reviews.text: Have other Sonos speakers, but put off getting these at first because of the high price. Finally broke down because we wanted something we could bring out easily to our outdoor patio. Wow, so pleasantly surprised. Sounds fabulous, definitely better than our Sonos ones. Great Bluetooth connectivity, connects easily to my iPhone, and switches between Bluetooth and Wi-Fi with a touch of a button. Even the integrated carrying handle is perfectly positioned and shaped. Very easy to pick up and move. We now bring ours outside whenever we are doing yardwork. Charging cradle works great. Now, if we could only get Sonos to make Wi-Fi and Bluetooth headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Motta

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our Sonos system
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t tried all the bells and whistles yet, but it sounds great, was just as easy to set up as our other Sonos products and incorporated into our system without a hitch. The speaker is bigger than a “one,” but the charging base is small. We keep it in the bathroom and use it in the yard and garage when on the move!
customer_reviews.author: A Egg

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this the other day. I was hesitant because it's so expensive compared to the others, but I'm very happy! Set up is easy. Had it up and running within 10 minutes after unpacking it. Sound is rich. Plus I'm digging the fact that it works both with wifi and bluetooth. No need to drain my phone battery more by using bluetooth unless I'm away from home using it and need to use it. I also really like the Alexa feature. Works seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Bricker

customer_reviews.title: Not really white. More grey
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Just thought people debating which color to get should know the white isn’t really white. It will not match your other white Sonos equipment. It is more of a light grey. Not really a big deal because we will be using this outside away from all the other equipment, but I didn’t read that before purchasing and thought others should know before making a decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me one for my birthday, and after he heard it (and he's an audiophile) he had to have one of his own!!!! These little devils are amazing, great sound. We are really enjoying. Thanks, Sonos!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nk

customer_reviews.title: The Sonos you know and love, but now on the go.
customer_reviews.text: The Sonos you know and love, but now on the go. Or, works just great as an addition to your current Sonos set up when you are at home. Sounds great. It's larger than you think. Comes with a nice cloth sack to put it in when you are transporting it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting through Covid isolation
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great and we can listen on the porch or patio. Integrated with our older Sonos speakers without a problem. We can either listen outside or turn selected speakers on. We have not tried the Alexia feature. Would rather not have the security risk
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am never buying a Bose Product again. Sonos does it again it’s official the speaker rocks battery life sound quality Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible battery life. It will die after a day or two even without using it. Wouldn’t recommend, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Can't stereo pair with sound bars or sub.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the sound quality but very unhappy with the fact you can't stereo pair it with your sub or sound bars. This was one thing I was truly looking forward to doing and was very disappointed when I found out that you couldn't. Hopefully Sonos will come out with an update to make it possible un the future but for now if you were looking to add the move to your stereo set up it's not the right speaker for you. With a $400 price tag this should definitely be an option.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Good
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, well built, easy connectivity either BT or wireless. Alexa integration is easy but not really interested in that. Mainly a good portable speaker for outside with good battery life. Like the charging cradle nice & compact just set the speaker in.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Friends with my neighbors again!
customer_reviews.text: INSANE! I got this because I sit outside and blare my Sonos inside so I can hear it outside. My neighbors are kind, but I know I’m irritating because I love music. This Move envelopes you in sound at a low volume. A-mazing. I’m in love. My neighbors thank you, Move!
customer_reviews.author: Melanee Stempien

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my patio, but I realised its sound was better than my Echo Studio. So, I am using it inside instead of the Studio and also taking it outside when needed. Consider this instead of an Echo Studio as it sounds better and is also portable.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Watson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful speaker
customer_reviews.text: Another great Sonos product. I Love the mobility of the speaker, and there is nothing to complain about the great Sonos sound that comes from it. I wish the cost was a bit less, but I guess you get what you pay for. This speaker does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: desdet

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I already have Sonos products. By adding Sonos Move gives me the flexibility to take it out on the patio or garage. Excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Alexa does not work if you are out of USA
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the fact that I would use Alexa as I use it on my echo devices. Unfortunately Sonos has disabled this function for my country and this make this just an expensive blue tooth speaker where I can not benefit from all its functions
customer_reviews.author: Lamki

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Had this item for a little over 1 month. For the last two weeks, I have been unable to connect my phone to it at all. Set up was initially fine for the first few weeks. However, now it constantly has a blinking red/orange light no matter how long it is left on the dock. I am unable to connect via wifi or bluetooth. It’s become an expensive paper weight at this point.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait - portability without compromise
customer_reviews.text: The Sonos speaker I always wanted; great sound for the price, excellent battery life and portable enough to carry around the house inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mov e by Sonos
customer_reviews.text: Sonos has done it. The perfect speaker, WiFi, Bluetooth, portability and sound quality all in one
customer_reviews.author: Richard Espinet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent System
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased 2 Sonos Move speakers and absolutely love them! We are not interested in setting up with Alexis or Siri, so we are happy to have the option of not having to turn those services on. We bought these speakers specifically to listen to music on Apple Play, Pandora, Spotify, and Sirius stations and just realized the added bonus of being able to also stream sounds from our Calm app. We also love that these speakers are both chargeable and portable. Finally, the sound quality is excellent; the music sounds deep and rich. We are so happy with these speakers that we're going to purchase 2 more to place throughout our home. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: littlebear

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Very familiar with Sonos products and always hoped they would make a waterproof/shatter proof speaker. As soon as I saw this one I was sold! and they did not disappoint!! The sound quality is amazing and the fact that it’s lightweight and portable makes it’s that much better!!!! This one speaker will easily carry sound throughout an entire room or area you want to play sound!!!! Well worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy one, buy 2!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Move!!!! Sound is amazing!!!! This is my second Move and I have linked them in my office for great sound! Used both of them on my deck/patio this weekend and the sound/base was crystal clear. I highly recommend this product and suggest buying 2 of them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably great sound
customer_reviews.text: From a single device this is the best sounding bluetooth speaker I have come across. It is also very loud. So if you are throwing your own house party because you can't go anywhere due to covid-19 this is the one to get. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Bass completely shot in only 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was quite pleased with the Move and its capabilities, although the sound didn't punch as much Bass as I'd like, but for $400, it seemed like a great deal... THAT'S UNTIL all the bass suddenly dropped last week (In week 6 of owning it). Of course I can't return it and get a full refund as it's been a little past a month and Amazon won't accept my return. Now I have to go through Sonos' support team to get the issue fixed. Pretty upsetting and disappointed for supposedly the best speaker in its class...
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mobile addition to your Sonos System
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing!!! The ability to easily move around a Sonos speaker sounds like you are recreating a built-in sound system - wherever you take the speaker. The Sonos system has been a phenomenal addition to our home and the move now extends the reach to our patio, pool, and garage. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan K. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Sonos sound and now thankfully, portable. Easy to install and integrate into my existing system. Use the Move most often on our big back porch and the sound quality even outdoors is terrific. Solidly built and rugged feel. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Trey  Burnett

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I’m using it different locations depending on the need.
customer_reviews.author: Jatr

customer_reviews.title: Installation ain’t a breeze
customer_reviews.text: System has a frustratingly simplistic connection instruction that doesn’t always work. When it won’t connect it offers no explanation and there is no one to pick up the phone at customer service. Wanted to like this speaker as it was a wedding gift but after arriving the 6 days after expected date it could not be activated in time to use because the intuitive instructions do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Moore

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?????
customer_reviews.text: Excellent SONOS quality. I love that I can combine it with my other SONOS speakers or keep it independent. I've taken it off site and used the blue-tooth and that works well too. Expensive but tons of value for the money. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: No aux, bluetooth delay
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, no aux 3mm input, lagging bluetooth playback (especially from my laptop while using a bluetooth mouse with the laptop at the same time). Any speaker without an aux deserves a low rating.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Fitzhenry

customer_reviews.title: Great product , excellent sound, but not a whole lot of volume
customer_reviews.text: Great product , excellent sound, but not a whole lot of volume and problems with bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No stereo or party mode on bluetooth!!
customer_reviews.text: Too bad NO STEREO and party mode not supported in bluetooth!! Only a single sonos move can be connected to a phone or computer. My other cheaper harman kardon onyx 4 and much cheaper JBL have stereo pair in bluetooth and even 100 speakers can be paired to work simultaneously. I purchased two sonos move for this... i should have not buy this if i knew this.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: It will Move you!
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this speaker. It fills the room or outdoor patio with the kind of quality sound that you expect from Sonos. I also take it with me for special events when I want quality sound to play via Bluetooth. You will appreciate the depth of bass and clarity the Move provides. And it works seemlessly with Alexa!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I Love this speaker, It is exactly what i wanted for my living room. The sound is big enough, and it works with both Amazon and Apple music, and I can control it with Alexa. I don't think I will be carrying it to the beach, but i know I can.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, portability and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and portable and waterproof. Easy to carry and piece of mind if you leave it out overnight. Connects seamlessly to Alexa. Better than any Bose speakers I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: PJM 4840

customer_reviews.title: Super Terrific and Portable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb product. Easy to install, add to your Sonos system, charge, and move around. The sound quality is terrific and the internal battery lasts all day (12 hours or more). You will love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Weisbrod

customer_reviews.title: These are a must
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - easy to setup - These are outdoor wireless rechargeable speakers that sound awesome. I think the batteries last about 10 hours. These are a must for your backyard
customer_reviews.author: Chris Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Sonos Move is by far the best
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth speaker on the planet. Works plugged in and has a battery power. Only speaker that provides Siri, Google Assistant, and Alexa that is portable and water resistant. Also Airplay 2, can’t beat it
customer_reviews.author: THEELASTDON

customer_reviews.title: Product already outdated since Sonos has come out with new app, and it doesn’t control this product!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. A new controller was released only a few weeks later, so we now own a Sonos product that doesn’t reliably work with our wifi, and is outdated already. The new controller app will not work with it, so at some point we will have no way to control the product! And now the return window has closed, and cannot return it!
customer_reviews.author: Music Girl

customer_reviews.title: Built in Alexa voice control does not work as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I have other Sonos products that I love. This one is not one of them. I have spent 2 days now trying to make the built in Alexa voice control work correctly. It will not play music with Alexa voice controls. It will not link up properly. I’ve tried everything and spoke with tech support. I’m sending it back. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Great add for a Sonos network
customer_reviews.text: Added one of these to complement our wired Sonos units so we could move sound out to the pool area on demand. Works great, excellent sound quality. A pair would be better!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas F. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker. We added to our existing Sonos system and it performs as one would expect a Sonos speaker to perform. The Bluetooth is awesome when outside the WiFi range and still sounds incredible. Definitely a great addition or stand alone speaker.
customer_reviews.author: 60diesel60

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I have used Sonos for some time and overall love the system but this has been exactly what they have been missing. Sound quality is fantastic and the portability is great. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: rjgsphinx

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I love my SONOS TV bar. But could not get Move to pair with anything. Five friends also tried to pair their smart phones to no avail. Returned with no problems. Will still buy other SONOS products.'
customer_reviews.author: nwman7

customer_reviews.title: Blown away
customer_reviews.text: Had a Bose mini. It died. Bit the bullet and bought this. Blown away by ease of use and sound. Unparalleled. Simply delightful. When you need music for therapy. Sonos Move is the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and hopefully getting better.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, superior to the Alexa Studio (which I also own). Airplay delay annoying and do not know if this is just the normal course of airplay. Can’t wait until it supports HD streams.
customer_reviews.author: Meet Mike!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can listen to my phone’s playlist. I own around 15-20 Sonos products and these are a great addition. I bought one for my son also because they are so impressive.
customer_reviews.author: George T. Peters

product_meta.title: Sonos Move - Battery-powered Smart Speaker, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth with Alexa built-in - Black​​​​​​​
product_meta.description: Style:Single| Color:BlackGet brilliant sound anywhere with the all-new Sonos Move, the durable, battery-powered smart speaker for outdoor and indoor listening. Setup takes minutes, and control is simple with the Sonos app, Bluetooth, AirPlay 2, and your voice. Stream over WiFi and connect Move to the rest of your Sonos system at home. Switch to Bluetooth when you're away and offline. Amazon Alexa is built right in so on WiFi you can play music, check news, set alarms, get your questions answered, and more, completely hands free. Experience surprisingly deep bass, a wide soundscape, and automatic Trueplay tuning that perfectly balances the sound for where you are and what you're listening to. Enjoy up to 11 hours of continuous play time and deep, powerful sound. Easily recharge Move on the included base, or a compatible USB-C charger.
feature_bullets: All-new Sonos Move - Get brilliant sound anywhere with the all-new Sonos Move, the durable, battery-powered smart speaker for outdoor and indoor listening.
Easy to use - Setup takes minutes, and control is simple with the Sonos app, Bluetooth, AirPlay 2, and your voice.Charging base power supply Input: 100-240V, 50-60 Hz, 1.2A; Output: 18VDC, 2.5A
Wi-Fi and Bluetooth - Stream over Wi-Fi and connect Move to the rest of your Sonos system at home. Switch to Bluetooth when you're away and offline.
Voice control - Amazon Alexa is built right in so on Wi-Fi you can play music, check news, set alarms, get your questions answered, and more, completely hands free.
Brilliant sound anywhere - Experience surprisingly deep bass, a wide soundscape, and automatic True-play tuning that perfectly balances the sound for where you are and what you're listening to.
Battery that lasts - Enjoy up to 10 hours of continuous play time and deep, powerful sound. Easily recharge Move on the included base, or a compatible USB-C charger.
Weather resistant - With an IP56 rating, Move stands up to humidity, rain, snow, dust, salt spray, UV rays, and extreme heat and cold.
Ultra-durable - Don't worry about accidental drops or bumps. Move's components are protected by a hard-wearing, shock-resistant case.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,355 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #12 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#206 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
